doc.title: Epic 1: Foundation & Infrastructure
doc.snippet: BondManager provides escrow management for market creator bonds with graduated refund logic. Integrates with ParameterStorage for bond tiers.

doc.title: System Architecture
doc.snippet: Dynamic creator rewards based on commitment. Three bond tiers with increasing creator fee percentages. Incentivizes quality market proposals.

doc.title: Story 1.3: ParameterStorage
doc.snippet: GlobalParameters provides bond_tier_1/2/3_lamports configuration for BondManager integration.

doc.title: Story 1.4: CoreMarkets
doc.snippet: CoreMarkets tracks total_creator_fees per market. Will call BondManager.add_creator_fees to accumulate fees for creators during bet processing.

artifact.reason: Complete BondManager implementation with 4 instructions: deposit_bond, refund_bond, claim_creator_fees, add_creator_fees. Includes BondEscrow account, graduated refund logic, and event emissions.
BondEscrow account structure with creator, bond_amount, market_id, status, timestamps, accumulated_fees, bond_tier. ~90 bytes space allocation.
Deposits bond to escrow PDA. Reads GlobalParameters for bond tier amounts, transfers SOL, initializes escrow with Active status. Emits BondDepositedEvent.
Graduated refund logic: Full (100%), Partial (50%), Slash (0%). Validates status and authorization, transfers refund, updates status. Emits BondRefundedEvent.
Allows creators to withdraw accumulated fees. Validates authorization and fees > 0, transfers to creator, resets accumulated_fees. Emits CreatorFeesClaimedEvent.
Called by CoreMarkets to accumulate bet fees. Transfers fees from fee_payer to escrow, increments accumulated_fees. Emits CreatorFeesAddedEvent.
Cross-program dependency. Provides bond_tier_1/2/3_lamports for deposit_bond instruction.

constraints.constraint: Use Anchor 0.32.1 framework with anchor-lang macros
Cross-program calls to ParameterStorage for bond tier amounts
Graduated refund logic: Full (100%), Partial (50%), Slash (0%)
Bond tier system: Tier1/2/3 with increasing bond amounts and creator fee percentages
Status validation: can only refund Active bonds, prevents double refunding
Creator authorization: only bond creator can refund or claim fees
Emit events for all state changes
Custom error codes for all failure scenarios

interface.name: GlobalParameters (ParameterStorage)
interface.usage: Read in deposit_bond instruction for bond tier amounts

interface.name: deposit_bond
interface.signature: pub fn deposit_bond(ctx: Context<DepositBond>, market_id: u64, bond_tier: BondTier) -> Result<()>
interface.usage: Creates escrow and deposits bond. Called by ProposalSystem when market proposal created.

interface.name: refund_bond
interface.signature: pub fn refund_bond(ctx: Context<RefundBond>, refund_type: RefundType) -> Result<()>
interface.usage: Refunds bond to creator with graduated logic. Full (100%), Partial (50%), or Slash (0%).

interface.name: claim_creator_fees
interface.usage: Allows creators to withdraw accumulated fees from betting activity.

interface.name: add_creator_fees
interface.signature: pub fn add_creator_fees(ctx: Context<AddCreatorFees>, fee_amount: u64) -> Result<()>
interface.usage: Called by CoreMarkets to accumulate bet fees for market creator.

tests.standards:
Anchor test suite using Mocha and Chai with TypeScript. Tests located in tests/ directory. Each instruction requires: 1) Happy path test with valid inputs 2) Edge case tests (all three refund types) 3) Error case tests (unauthorized access, double refund) 4) Integration tests for cross-program calls
Devnet deployment testing required before marking story complete. Deposit bonds with all three tiers, test refund scenarios, accumulate and claim fees.
tests.locations: - tests/bond-manager.ts (primary test file) - Anchor.toml (test configuration with devnet cluster)
